title: Goldy2011
author: Goldy2011
content: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FTdW2ZgXoAA9utS?format=jpg&name=largeThe Mallconomy Bounty Campaign is live! Complete daily social tasks, refer friends and get involved the Metaverse’s most fun shopping mall to earn your share of $5 MILLION $WOOT tokens!What is MallconomyMallconomy is an ever-evolving universe that aims to become the primary standard in blockchain gaming through its one-of-a-kind, fun and sustainable, robust GameFi economy. An auspicious concept, set in perhaps the most inauspicious of settings — your local shopping mall! Mallconomy has been a long time coming. Since the 1990’s, our founding members — gamers at heart — dreamed of building a game that combined the economies of creation, work and fun. The possibility to constructively spend time online, and to be fairly rewarded for those efforts, and the idea that one should be able to sustain themselves remotely, doing something they truly love should, in the age of Web3, not just be a dream.https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FTeAvCpXwAksFDa?format=jpg&name=largeWebsite : https://mallconomy.com/Bounty Contest : https://bounty.mallconomy.com/r/bambang70Community : https://go.mallconomy.com/bioDiscord : https://discord.gg/mallconomyTelegram : https://t.me/mallconomyTwitter : https://twitter.com/mallconomyFacebook : https://web.facebook.com/MallconomyInstagram : https://www.instagram.com/mallconomy/
